chara.textHome: Rena Minami. Intro over.
What?

It's nothing personal, I just don't
have anything else to say.
Ugh, fine! You want my basic info, right?
Is that enough for ya?
I'm from Kamihama. Intro over.
Huh?! THAT'S not enough?

Pfft, fine then, if you're such an expert
let's see YOUR self-intro.
I'll listen real close.
Yeah, nice going!

If things keep up like this, my team
just might get a name as the strongest
Magical Girl team in town!

We're gonna have a problem
if you think this is all I'm capable of.
Trying hard makes you confident, right?
I remember somebody sayin' that.
And I'm trying real hard.
Getting stronger is awesome.

Cause this power here?
It's also for Momoko and Kaede...
It's for protecting the team.
I gotta start giving myself some more love.

Seriously, if I go around hating my own
guts, what's going to happen to the
people who like me, hm?

You're late. I've been waiting
for 5 minutes already.
Now you owe me some snacks.
Morning...
Huh? No, I'm not in a bad mood.
Look... I definitely AM a morning person.
Ughh, everything is SO annoying.
What?!
Isn't it obvious that I'm hungry?!

Everyone gets irritable when
they're hungry, y'know!
I bought some new songs!
They're from my favorite artist.

I love when pop artists put rock 
elements in their music!
I'm about to go to sleep.

If this isn't really important,
I'm gonna punch you. Hard.
You mean the snappable glow sticks, right?
I like those old-school ones too...

But you need to get the official glow sticks
if you want your favorite member's color.
It's almost time to leave.

Aren't you ready yet?
Ugh, I'm ready and waiting...

Don't bother apologizing.
You've got five seconds to finish.

If someone messes with you,
you gotta put them in their place.

No way am I having people think
I ran away without putting up a fight.
Hehehehehe!

You're dying to ask why I'm in 
such a good mood, aren't you?
I won some of my favorite artist's merch!

It's all about custard when
it comes to filled donuts.

Screw jelly! And of course milk with tea
in it is the perfect accompaniment.

I have this video of one of my favorite
shows on my computer,

but I just can't bring myself to delete it,
even after I burned it onto a DVD!
Would you be able to?

Hey, now! You almost gave me a heart
attack talking out of the blue like that.
You better watch out.
I'm gonna get you back for that.
Momoko's amazing.
She can make friends with anyone...
It doesn't look like she's even trying!
I guess it's better to just be yourself?
Wanna go to a concert sometime?

I'll teach you the dances and all the rules
only us loyals fans know.
I got angry over something dumb again...
I really want to stop being so hot-headed!

It'd definitely be better for the team
if I could...
Hm, Kaede, Momoko, Rena...
Ka, Mo... Kamore Triangle?
No... That sounds weird…
You're still asking me about that?
Who cares how I became a Magical Girl!
I don't wanna talk about it...
I don't plan on losin', got it?

This result seems quite natural
to me, y'know?
You're not bad.
This is all thanks to you. Thank you.
It's definitely high five time!
I'm Rena Minami. Pleased to meet you.

...Hm? Listen, I hate introducing myself,
going on and on.

Just ask me questions if you
have 'em, and I'll answer.
So I went up a level in toughness, huh?
Can I take a swing at you to test it out?

Well, I feel like I reached my goal
for the time being.

Getting into fights is just part of my
personality. So I gotta toughen up.

I'll take any enemy on if they're
lookin' to fight.

The stronger they are,
the greater it feels when I beat 'em!
A hothead makes for a sore loser, right?

If having this fiery personality is gonna get
me ahead, I guess I don't mind it so much.
